body.name: Unscented Baby Wipes- 6 Flip-Top Pack (288 Total)

features: Baby Wipes: WBM baby wipes are soft, unscented wipes made with natural ingredients wood pulp.
Soft and moist: WBM Baby wipes are soft and moist, making them on babies' skin. They are also pre-moistened, so there is no need to wet them before use.
Easy to use: WBM Baby wipes come in a convenient pack that is easy to open and close. This makes it easy to grab a wipe when you need one.
Value pack: WBM Baby wipes are available in a value pack, which makes them a great option for parents on a budget.
Trusted Brand: QUALITY IS OUR PASSION. We do not compromise on quality. If you think this product is not for you, We give 100 percent money back within 30 days.
body.description: Keep your little one clean with WBM Baby Care Wet Wipes! These refreshing wipes remove all the mess. Plus, a blend of premium ingredients is added to provide effective nourishment to your little one. Each pack contains 6 convenient flip-top dispensers, making it easy to access and use the wipes whenever you need them. They are great for use on hands, face, and other areas that need a quick clean-up. These wipes are flushable, making diaper changes and clean-ups a breeze. Simply dispose of them in the toilet without worrying about clogging pipes. If you are looking for a high-quality, gentle, and effective baby wipes, the WBM Care Baby Wet Wipes are a great option.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #61,187 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #382 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really great product and is very handy indeed. I use it not only for wiping but also is great to refresh around your body and face. It is stated for sensitive skin and I have so far I have had no reactions. Really soft and barely any scent at all. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like these wipes. They are pefect for my baby and all my other children. Gentle on faces and even wiping down surfaces. I really like that the rip in half easily too, helps me not be wasteful! Very soft and so nice that there are not unnessisary fragrances! Perfect for what I need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to help take care of my nephews who have sensitive skin. I noticed they have to have fragrance free wipes so I purchased these and another item. I’m impressed because I wasn’t thinking these would be as good as her more expensive wipes but wow! These are thick, clean up dirty baby dipes, AND natural and fragrance free. The only real minor con is I keep getting my hand stuck in the package trying to get another wipe out. Overall, these are amazing and we when get close to running out I’ll purchase more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this wipes first time but I get so impressed about the quality. They are soft and gentle, great texture. Alcohol and scent free, what is just perfect for my child which has problem with skin ecsema. Easy to use and perfect size to carry in the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wipes are surprisingly thick
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with these wipes. They're very thick, which is good, because I purchased them for big kid and adult use! They would work great for cleaning baby's big messes, but are soft enough to clean the small ones as well. ;)EDIT: after using the wipes for a week, I'm lowering my rating from 5 to 3 stars because it's not very easy to pull the wipes from the package. Being as these are marketed as baby wipes, a mother in the middle of cleaning a baby wouldn't want to deal with the frustration of needing to use 2 hands to get a wipe out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty darn good!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are pretty good! My family and I have sensitive skin so the fact that they don’t have a scent decreases our chances of getting irritated by them. They have the right amount of moisture. A lot of other wipes are either too wet or too dry, these are just right. I like the pop up top, as long as you close it correctly, they shouldn’t dry out. They are great for travel and for home! I would purchase again. They did take a long time to arrive but that’s understandable due to the current climate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One happy customer!!
reviews.reviewText: I like that they're really truly unscented (no fake scent, just the aloe vera smell as it's a main ingredient). I tried it on myself first, and I was so glad to learn that it wouldn't irritate my eyes or bring the stinging sensation (when it accidentally touched the corner of my eye). No harsh chemicals there, it seems. Plus it's so smooth!I guess I'm using these as facial wipes from now on. 😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: WBM Baby Care Unscented Baby Wipes-6 Flip-Top Pack are a great value. These wipes are flushable, thick, and soft, which makes for a smooth and soft clean. The wipes are unscented, so no need to worry about irritation. I like the tight locking flip top closure, keeps the wipes from drying out. I would recommend these to anyone!
